thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Aldo Chetcuti
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Aldo Chetcuti

author: Aldo Chetcuti
title: Aldo Chetcuti
text: I am an EU citizen and have dealt with various sites in China. Some are ok and some are not, at all! Banggood is one of those I would not hesitate one second to recommend. I have invariably had good experiences with them and I have ordered extensively different items. I have been satisfied most of the time and on a couple of rare occasions when I have found fault with items I bought from them, they have rectified by refund or replacement expeditiously and without undue hesitation. I choose the slowest mail option and have never waited past three weeks to receive orders. What is there to complain about!? Highly recommended to anyone.
